code: import axios from'axios';import{useMutation,useQuery}from'react-query';export const useGetOwnersApi=request=>{return useQuery(['get_owners',request],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_restaurant_owner_details/",params:request}));};export const useGetOwnerOtherDetailsApi=id=>{return useQuery(['get_owner_other_detail',id],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_owner_other_detail/".concat(id,"/")}));};export const useChangeOwnerStatusApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/change_rest_owner_status/",data:info.request}));};export const useUpdateOwnerDocumentStatusApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/update_owner_document_status/",data:info.request}));};export const useGetOwnerCountApi=()=>{return useQuery(['dashboard_owner_count'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/dashboard_owner_count/"}));};
